title: Can't scroll in Https://www.nsinternationaal.nl

Had to use Microsoft Edge to book a voyage. To see in Firefoxs the bottom/rest of the screen I had to zoom out which makes it impossible to read due to the size of the letters. How come?

content:

title: Recover FF session from yesterday after restoring Windows 10 with a backup form a week ago (FF sync is on)
content:
Windows 10 crashed so I had to restore it with a backup from one week ago.

My restored Windows shows the open tabs in FF from a week ago. I thought that having FF sync on would automatically restore my last session (in this case from yesterday) but is doesn't, so I've lost some important new open tabs.

Any idea how to get the most recent session back?
creator: AnneMeu

title: Browser
content: My ff was auto updated recently. Now I can not find dark mode for my browser. I really do not understand that changes..
creator: goranbzg

title: Onde está a opção "Enviar para dispositivo"?
content:
Por favor, preciso de ajuda.

A opção "enviar para dispositivo" simplesmente desapareceu nesta última atualização (92.0), tanto clicando com o botão direito do mouse sobre a aba ou sobre a página em questão. É realmente estranho, pois o Firefox Sync reconhece todos os dispositivos e até consigo acessar as últimas abas abertas, tanto no celular (Android) quanto no PC, mas a comunicação para compartilhamento das abas simplesmente não funciona mais (a opção de envio do PC para o celular não existe, enquanto o PC não recebe qualquer notificação de aba recebida do celular, enquanto no Android aparece como enviado).

Este recurso é um dos que me fez optar pelo Firefox em ambos os dispositivos que tenho (além do Multi-Account Container da versão de PC), então não posso abrir mão dele ou simplesmente trocar de browser.
creator: foxiexxx

title: Firefox Addons Not Showing on Customize Toolbar page
content:
When I installed an addons, I don't see it in the overflow menu or anywhere in the toolbar. When I entered the Customize Toolbar page, I only saw my other addons, but my new addon is nowhere in sight, making it useless. I have seen lots of solution to this, but they doesn't work for me. I'm running the latest update of Firefox and my Firefox is not set to Automatic Private Browsing. Please help!

Thanks in advance.
creator: AthensMaster

title: firefox 92 broken using windows high contrast setting
content: I think my Firefox just updated to 92.0. The Windows 10 high contrast setting stopped working properly. Website backgrounds should be black, but they are now white. I'm. using a Surface Go, Win 10 Home.
creator: dave505

title: Firefox Crash on Program Startup - WIndows 7
content:
Hello there - hoping for a hand to fix this. Several months ago Firefox crashed while it was in use - void of any update process. Upon reopening, the main window would launch and before any tabs could load it would crash again. I attempted to open in troubleshoot mode with the identical result. I gave it a break and used Chrome but in returning to this issue today the same has occurred. This time after the troubleshoot mode crash, I uninstalled Firefox and re-installed fresh (this was an upgrade from v89 to v92). Upon opening post update the browser crashed again. Each time this happens I have received a crash report screen which I accepted and it was reported as successfully submitted. However, when I open the crash report folder only two appear to have been saved - one old from the first occurrence (6/2021) and one from today(8/10/21). Both of these are linked below for review.

This is on an older Windows 7 machine that honestly I know should be updated but this is only used for light gaming and web surfing and I am not interested in an OS upgrade as I disagree with with the business practices of Microsoft - I find their policies are rather intrusive as a consumer.

I hope I've given enough information about the issue here and my system, thanks in advance for any help!

-J

System Info Intel I7 4770K 16gb RAM Geforce GT1060 Gigabyte Z97 Motherboard

Early instance of crash report in June 2021: Crash ID: bp-1fce2514-da15-4ff1-9e4c-7d0510210622 Most recent crash report from earlier today (8/10/21): Crash ID: bp-e888ef81-491c-42ae-9878-124970210810
creator: jalbyx

title: latest firefox update 92.0 interferes with scroll function of logitech trackball
content: Before this latest firefox update 92.0, pressing either inner/small button on logitech trackball enabled easy scrolling with just the ball. Now that has stopped working and I have to go to the pulldown on the right. Running Mac 11.5.2
creator: johndmeyer04

title: Scrolling thru tabs with mouse wheel
content: I work with many tabs open and i use the mouse scroll wheel to scroll thru them, since forever the scroll wheel behaved the same, you scroll up (push the scroll away from you) and it scroll to the end (right) side of the tabs, you scroll down ( pull the scroll wheel towards you) if scroll to the start of the tab bar (left). today to my surprise i opened firefox and immediately noticed this change... no extensions were installed or uninstalled nothing was changed since last use.
creator: cassolzao

title: Pasting text from LibreOffice causes Firefox to crash.
content:
I found a rather specific & fatal issue which causes Firefox to stop responding completely & needs to force quit.

If I copy any normal text content from a LibreOffice document & attempt to paste it into FF URL bar as a search term, the moment I select paste FF will stop responding & no text is pasted.

I have tried pasting text from other sources such as Gedit or an email, but that is fine. It is specifically text copied from LibreOffice (writer, v7.2)

I am using FF 91 on Gnu/Linux Manjaro 21.1
creator: riquez

title: Menu Spacing
content:
Why do you fix things that ain't broke. You want to change things advise those that want change of necessary ACTIONS TO ACCEPT CHANGE. I've had to waste precious time getting to this screen to enter message. Screen real estate is a premium. Why blow it up with white space. Come on! Please return to previous screen formats.

It's been quite awhile since you've made unnecessary display format changes. Please return it to the way it was.

title: Bookmarks toolbar disappeared this morning (I believe since updating to v92.0 64bit)
content:
Bookmarks toolbar disappeared this morning (I believe since updating to v92.0 64bit) Running Windows 7 64bit Tried View > Toolbars > Bookmarks Toolbar > Always Show = Nothing. Allocation of Toolbar space is shown and allocated but it is empty. Tried to sync now, still no luck.

Under Bookmarks button on the menu bar on top of Firefox > Bookmarks Toolbar and all its contents are there.

Please help.

SherabPuntsok

title: Looking to disable _automatic_ HTTP redirects
content:
Is there a way to prevent a website from automatically redirecting to a different URL? Note that I have found a method that seems to work, but it simply errors out when a website tries to redirect. I'd prefer to _see_ the URL the website is trying to redirect to, and have Firefox ask me for permission before going there.

Is this possible?
